dmca.title: iCuban.com Requests Google Takedown Recipes
dmca.body:
iCuban.com: The Internet Cuban
[private]
Eagan, MN 55123
February 6, 2004

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1 .	The copyrighted work at issue is the text (and in many cases photos) that 	appears on http://www.icuban.com/food/comida.html and numerous individual 
	recipe pages linked to this master page. The infringing pages listed below 	copy the text verbatim from our website and in several instances include 	copyrighted photos from our site.

2.	Search Query: Cuban food, Cuban food recipes, and in addition specific 	recipe titles and body text.

Infringing Web Pages:

http://cookbook.rin.ru/cookbook_e/recipes/19692310.html

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in 	the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
